title: Need help regarding RP purchases
body: So i want to make an account at Russian server..My question is should i have any problem with RP purchase in game if I pay with a credit card if the server currency is rubla(idk how to spell that)?

replies.body: Each country may have specific regulations which can impact how RP is purchased.  For your specific issue, please reach out to our billing team by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll be able to look into this for you and provide some options!
